name: 15 Minute Brownies
description: 1. Combine flour, soda and salt; set aside.          2. In microwave-safe mixing bowl, combine butter, sugar and water. Cook for        2 minutes at 100% power, stirring after 1 minute. Remove from oven.Add 1        cup chocolate chips and vanilla and stir until smooth and chips are melted.                3. Add eggs, one at a time, beating after each addition. Blend in flour        mixture and stir in remaining chocolate chips.                4. Pour into an 8 or 9 inch microwave-safe baking pan. Place a saucer,        upside down, in the microwave and put baking pan on top of saucer.                5. Cook at 70% power for 10 minutes turning after 5 minutes. Enjoy!                busted by sooz        Posted to recipelu-digest by sooz <kirkland@gj.net> on Mar 18, 1998
